sm_message: Make yourself at home - drinks are just a tap away
subject: Subject
inquire_plan: I would like to inquire about the {{sub}} plan.

home.explore: Explore cafés that make ordering simple
home.explore_desc: See where you can skip the wait, order with a scan, and enjoy a smoother dining experience.
home.title: Boost Your Café’s Service with QR Ordering
home.subtitle: Reduce wait times, streamline orders, and keep customers happy—all with a simple scan.
home.step1_desc: Customers simply scan the code at their table.
home.step2_desc: No app needed. See the full menu and order instantly.
home.step3_desc: Orders go directly to staff – no delays, no confusion.
home.analytics_desc: From order trends and best-selling items to staff performance insights — our powerful dashboard gives you the data you need to optimize your business and serve smarter.
home.upgrade_text: Upgrade your café experience in minutes
home.streamlined_operations_desc: Digital ordering cuts errors and speeds up service—what customers select goes straight to the kitchen, avoiding miscommunication. Menus update in real time, so out-of-stock items are marked instantly.
home.improved_efficiency_desc: Digital ordering cuts errors and speeds up service—what customers select goes straight to the kitchen, avoiding miscommunication. Menus update in real time, so out-of-stock items are marked instantly.
home.multilingual_support_title: Multilingual Support for a Global Clientele
home.multilingual_support_desc: Serve customers from all around the world with language support that ensures a smooth and easy ordering experience.
